mapper.select: select count(*) from map where place_url=#{place_url}
select count(*) from party where place_id in (select place_id from map where place_id = #{place_id}) and status = 1
select * from map where name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
mapper.update: update map set rating_avg = (select round(avg(rating),2) from review where parent_seq = #{seq}) where seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: select * from (select * from map order by rating_avg desc) where rownum <= 5
select * from map where map.place_id in (select place_id from (select place_id, count(*) from party group by place_id order by COUNT(*) desc) where rownum <= 5 ) order by seq desc
